Make sure to read the README, for important informations and to learn about this modules features, since there are quite a few and they are not all connected.

Bugs? Issues?

Read and follow these instructions.

Suggestions? Feature Requests? Feedback?

Don't ask me on Discord. Use the GitHubs Issue Board for questions, suggestions, bugs, helping other peoples questions getting answered, ... .

Before you post anything, check the issues board first if your issue, question, etc. has been posted already. If yes, comment on the existing post and/or give it a thumbsup!

Currently planned features (and bugs) are on the GitHubs Issue Board.

Best regards,
Moerill
